personal.name: Hareesh Raj
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Results-driven Full Stack Developer with a strong background in building scalable ecommerce applications using microservices architecture and RESTful services. Experienced in Java, Spring Boot, React.js and MySQL with a proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions.

experience.description: As a core developer, I drove the successful launch of our new e-commerce platform, boosting efficiency by building a library of reusable components and integrating critical services like Avalara, Klaviyo, and ShipHero. I built the complete gift card lifecycle and a user-friendly dashboard for order tracking. Additionally, I managed a complex legacy system migration while preserving SEO rankings and mentored junior developers to ensure alignment with US stakeholders.

Worked on a hotel booking engine where I optimized RESTful APIs and automated order synchronization, driving a 12% revenue increase and an 85% efficiency boost. I developed scalable backend solutions, revamped user interfaces for better engagement, and integrated critical systems like Hapi CRM and Celopay. Additionally, I enhanced content management, implemented message queues for asynchronous processing, and led SEO optimizations, all while collaborating with stakeholders to drive innovation.

I contributed to an internal event website by building reusable front-end components that reduced development time by 25%. I also worked on the architecture for a test proctoring system and an online code compiler, implementing full-stack solutions to handle high traffic during campus hiring—efforts that reduced costs by 75%. Furthermore, I implemented Redis caching to improve site performance by 95% and optimized backend controllers for a seamless user experience.
Built interactive online exam monitoring application used for campus recruitment. Collaborated with designers to bring award-winning concepts to life using SpringBoot and React.

education.description: Specialized in Web Development and Distributed Systems. Published research on deep learning for image classification.
Completed my high school education with a strong foundation in computer science.

recommendations.name: Mounika Murugeshan
recommendations.text: I had the pleasure of working with Hareesh during my time at CDW, and his skills and dedication are exceptional. Though he is a budding talent in the field, his proactive learning approach and impressive full-stack development skills truly distinguish him. He excels at understanding project requirements, supporting his team, and continuously seeking feedback to improve. Beyond his technical abilities, Hareesh is also a fun person to work with, bringing enthusiasm and a positive attitude to the team. He’s a promising new talent and a valuable asset to any team. I highly recommend him.
